content: अनुवादक, --वादिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Explanatory, corroborative, repeating with comment, explanation or illustration; आरंभश्च साहसानुवादी <ls>Dk. 95</ls> bespeaks. {@--2@} Conformable to, in harmony with, like; युक्तगीतानुवादिना <ls>Rām.</ls>; तदनुवादिगुणः कुसुमोद्गमः <ls>R. 9. 30.</ls> --न् {%<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of any one of the three notes of the gamut.
